Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: They are offering fragrance, incense and Panchamrit and lighting the earthen lamps, they are putting the garlands of flowers around her neck.286

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: “O mother! we are causing Thee to listen, we are repeating Thy Name, and we are not remembering anyone else

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: We are singing Thy praises and we are offering flowers to honour Thee

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: All the young women of Braja, getting pleased and bowing their heads and touching the feet of the goddess, went to their own homes.289.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ ਚਰਨੀ ਪੈ ਕੇ ਤੇ ਬੇਨਤੀ ਕਰ ਕੇ ਘਰਾ ਨੂੰ ਚਲੀਆਂ ਗਈਆਂ ॥੨੮੯॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: They were all saying this, that Durga, having been pleased, has bestowed on all of us Krishna as our bridegroom

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: And filled with this delilght, all those beautiful ladies reached their homes,

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਆਨੰਦ ਨਾਲ ਮਸਤ ਹੋਈਆਂ ਸਾਰੀਆਂ (ਗੋਪੀਆਂ) ਆਪਣੇ ਸੁੰਦਰ ਘਰਾ ਦੇ ਨੇੜੇ ਪਹੁੰਚ ਗਈਆਂ ਹਨ।

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: They gave abundance of charity to Brahmins, because they had obtained their Krishna, as desired by their heart.290.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਉਨ੍ਰਹਾ ਨੇ) ਬਹੁਤਿਆਂ ਬ੍ਰਾਹਮਣਾ ਨੂੰ ਦਾਨ ਦਿੱਤਾ ਹੈ (ਕਿਉਾਂਕਿ) ਉਨ੍ਰਹਾ ਦੇ ਮਨ ਇਛਿਤ ਮਿਤਰ ਵਜੋਂ ਕ੍ਰਿਸ਼ਨ ਨੂੰ ਪ੍ਰਾਪਤ ਕੀਤਾ ਹੈ ॥੨੯੦॥
